gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 123, Pelicans 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Pelicans, 123-114. Pascal Siakam led Indiana with 24 points, 11 rebounds, and five assists as Tyrese Haliburton totaled his 34th PTS/AST double double of the year with 17 points and 13 assists. Brandon Ingram (30 points, six rebounds, four assists) led the Pelicans as CJ McCollum and Zion Williamson added 23 points each. The Pacers move to 34-26 on the year (20 wins at home – fifth EC team to do so w/ BOS, CLE, MIL, NY) while the Pelicans move to 35-25.
